role: Rare earth elements for quantum hardware

thesis: Post-quantum cryptography beneficiaries; near-term revenue catalyst
High expense ratio, holds non-quantum stocks, diluted exposure

why_they_win: GPU clusters remain the dominant high-performance computing platform; enterprises redirect quantum budgets to proven AI accelerators
Classical optimization software for defense/enterprise solidifies position; no quantum disruption to business model
Data center CPUs/GPUs capture workloads that quantum promised but couldn't deliver
Classical cryptography remains sufficient longer; PQC migration urgency evaporates, protecting existing security moats
Cybersecurity incumbents don't face "cryptographic apocalypse" forcing architecture rewrites; existing solutions remain relevant
Networking infrastructure doesn't require quantum-safe overhaul; capex cycles normalize
